Docs.summary: Stores attachments to be sent as part of an e-mail message.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Instances of the AttachmentCollection class are returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.AlternateViews%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Attachments%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
Use the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.AlternateViews%2A> property to specify copies of an e-mail message in different formats. For example, if you send a message in HTML, you might also want provide a plain text version in case some of the recipients use e-mail readers that cannot display HTML content.
Use the collection returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Attachments%2A> property to add an attachment, such as a file or the contents of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> to this <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage>.
